nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_0
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Denotation: move slowly on water or in the air Connotation: It has a sense of falling in a casual and aimless manner. Used in this context, this verb stresses the shocking consequence that this innocent-looking white dot was to cause.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_1
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Denotation: go down below the surface of water Connotation: gradually get into a worse state (It has a sense of helplessness.)

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_2
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Denotation: make a loud noise like a thunder Connotation: This verb implies a sense of overpowering or overwhelming under the attack of the nuclear bomb.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_3
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Denotation: destroy or ruin Connotation: The verb implies that life is of complete powerlessness and insignificance in face of such massive destruction.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_4
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Denotation: move slowly from side to side or backwards and forwards Connotation: The verb implies that the man was made extremely sick and weak as a result of excess exposure to burning and radiation.

nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.name: Item_5
nhmonkey.Recorder_-Input.value: Denotation: the soul of a dead person Connotation: It implies that the person is extremely weakened. It has a sense of horror and misery.
